mapper.insert: insert into chas_xt_sswpg (ID,ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQMC, BAQID, MC, SFZNG,DWDM ,DWXTBH ,YSID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),#{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzng,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update chas_xt_sswpg set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MC = #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFZNG = #{sfzng,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DWDM = #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DWXTBH = #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YSID = #{ysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQMC, BAQID, MC, SFZNG ,DWDM ,DWXTBH ,YSID from chas_xt_sswpg where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQMC, BAQID, MC, SFZNG ,DWDM ,DWXTBH ,YSID from chas_xt_sswpg
1=1 and isdel =0
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and YSID = '${ysid}'
and MC LIKE '%${mc}%'
and LRR_SFZH = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and BAQID in (select baqref.baqid from chas_xt_baqref baqref where baqref.sydwdm ='${sydwdm}')
